website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and inexpensive, these coveralls come in a five-pack and include protection for your face, feet, and head.
pros: Hold up well, even though they are lightweight
cons: These are good for smaller people, but might not work for those taller than 6'

customer_reviews.title: thin and rips easily but okay for light duty
customer_reviews.text: i bought this so i wouldnt get super dirty while crawling in the attic trying to pull an ethernet cable this however, did not last long as it rips easily from crawling on the plywood 3M tyvek lasts much longer but is also much more expensive this is fine for light duty, just wouldnt recommend it for anything more... get something thicker or more durable for environments like an attic size was okay, starting to get tight around the crotch area i am 5'7
customer_reviews.author: EvilTechie

customer_reviews.title: Made for Children
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the XXL and they torn just trying to get them on! Crouch to shoulder too tight and would not zip up. They ripped out just going into the crawl space. Worthless due to size!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Coy

customer_reviews.title: As described and fit well for a big guy like me.
customer_reviews.text: I had to install insulation in the attic. It fits well for us big guys using 2XL sizes. Was able to move easily. It didn't rip on me which was a huge plus. Escaped without getting the itches so no issues. Will use again for messing jobs.
customer_reviews.author: dsodesign

customer_reviews.title: size inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: they worked for the purpose. the sizing wasn't consistent. I bought 2, 2 packs of the same size yet one in each pack was slightly smaller than the other. they tear fairly easily and have zero airflow - so very hot and sweaty. I got the job done with them.
customer_reviews.author: aah

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough for the price. Runs very small... I'm 5'7" and the XL barely fits me. The crotch inevitably splits because they're not big enough. So order up 1-2 sizes... I would normally order a unisex large (maybe an XL if I want a loose fit) but I'll need an XXL. I'd definitely order these again... but in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Kali888

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, would have liked one size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Good overall quality coverall but a bit big (2XL) for me at 5'9" and 170lbs. Would have ordered the next size down if they had been available but unfortunately they were not at the time. That said, it is a coverall so I don't care if it's a bit bunched up in some areas and it leaves room if I need to use them with a coat on in colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great for small jobs or the occasional dirty job.
customer_reviews.text: Used these for moving blown in insulation and installing fiberglass batting insulation in an attic. Never an itch where the coveralls covered. Pros: relatively durable, decent zippers, decent fit Cons: XL was too short for 6'2" tall
customer_reviews.author: hummvee69

customer_reviews.title: Runs extremely small
customer_reviews.text: These run extremely small. I ordered, and received 5 pairs of XXL. These are three largest size thru have and they're extremely tight on me. Im 6' tall, 190lbs. They're so small that they actually apply pressure to me shoulders because they pull up agaisnt the groin area. Everybody must be dwarf size in whatever country these came from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is not good! Ordered extra large and they barely fit. I’m 5’11 and 165 lbs and could barely get these on. They are lightweight,fairly comfortable and perform pretty good
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Just What Was Needed
customer_reviews.text: I was using these for painting my house with a airless sprayer. They were perfect for the job. No leaks on to my clothes and were fairly cool to work in. Would buy again. Used twice and then disposed.
customer_reviews.author: Casch

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than expected
customer_reviews.text: These coveralls are rather thin and tore easily, even though I had knee pads on.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: I got a 2x, I wear a 1x, it was more of a xl. It worked, but did tear in the crotch area as it was too small. I would recommend, but keep in mind the size you order...
customer_reviews.author: Carol P

customer_reviews.title: Size is smaller that states, ok for quicker small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was smaller than it stated we would have to increase the 2x to 4 x for the fit , it just ripped up trying to where the 2x they sent . Not really happy about that
customer_reviews.author: Nadine K.

customer_reviews.title: Won't keep anything out
customer_reviews.text: Won't protect you much. You can literally breathe through this. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Morten N.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning/painting
customer_reviews.text: Bought the large. It fits well and kept my clothing clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit well good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: My son and I recently suited up with these disposable overalls to do an insulation removal job. The 2 XL size fit perfectly and allowed us to move and work easily as well as avoid the itchiness of the insulation. I was actually surprised at what quality there was for such a low price
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Molczyk

customer_reviews.title: Good PPE
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to wear when applying poison around the outside of house when it’s going to take awhile
customer_reviews.author: vj1865

customer_reviews.title: No tears with hard use
customer_reviews.text: Used them for a house cleanup. After renters with many cats made a mess of the house these suits were great. Goo protection no tears.
customer_reviews.author: calvados man

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose handy
customer_reviews.text: The ticks are so bad this year I started using this suit when I’m in the woods or fields. They work great but they are disposable, so be a little gentle with the crotch seams.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Semi water resistant, I used for slime for our gender reveal and nothing got on my white jumpsuit underneath .
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been very satisfied with these coveralls. The elastic wrists and hood are very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Z

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pack of five, first one out of the pack the zipper broke the second time I unzipped it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I keep several of these "suits" in my car trunk.
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever stopped to assist a stranded motorist you know how suddenly you may become filthy! (think, pushed car out of muddy grass!!!!!) Also, around frightened livestock, lol!
customer_reviews.author: TiffZooooNe

customer_reviews.title: Great coveralls.
customer_reviews.text: They served their purpose, which in our case was a moldy garage. Comfortable to wear, protected well. Felt they were very reasonable for the job they performed.
customer_reviews.author: Cadillac Kath

customer_reviews.title: nice suit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: i used it to sand the bottom of a boat, very messy job. Each suit lasted a day of crawling around under the boat.
customer_reviews.author: ComputerGuy

customer_reviews.title: Does the work!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly like I thought it would, kept debris off me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: works well comfortable fit and no longer worried about chemical contact!
customer_reviews.author: katharine

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do anything to relieve the drain odor. Put in one stick, then another, then another . . . finally up to five at one time . . . nothing. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmi

customer_reviews.title: Good value, they do the job.
customer_reviews.text: They're disposable remember so don't last forever. I'm 6ft and 250lbs and XXL fits well. I use them as a protective suit when working with my bees. So I'm bending and stooping and moving about. If I overdo it, they do part at the seams, typically around the crotch or behind (then I have to run for it!) I use these because they are lightweight and the porous fabric assures good ventilation. At this price they are excellent value. If you're looking for a durable heavy suit, these are the wrong choice.
customer_reviews.author: K.T. Portland

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description leads to expensive item
customer_reviews.text: Description says 5 items per bag, however only received 2 pieces. This equals to $12.50 per item which is way over priced. I am not happy with this purchase as it is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size - it fit a big guy perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: My husband found it too hot to wear for too long- but loved everything else about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M.

product_meta.title: Cleaing Disposable Coveralls with Hood 2XL Protective coverall Elastic Wrist 2 Pack
feature_bullets: EXCELLENT QUALITY - Material: 45g SMS, Our disposable coveralls can provide long-lasting protection, it's lightweight, cool and comfortable. I am 100% sure you will love it
SERVED THEIR PURPOSE - Disposable coverall provides full upper body coverage during laminating and grinding, keep dust and chemicals off clothes away from your skin
MULTI-APPLICATION - Apply to daily home decoration works and regular industrial protections such as sewer cleaning, car painting, garden pruning, interior decorations etc.
SOFT AND LIGHTWEIGHT - This disposable coveralls be made of environment friendly material called SMS Polypropylene, they are very soft and comfortable
LIFETIME GUARANTEE - Cleaing brand disposable coverall comes with a 100% Money Back Lifetime Guarantee

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
